statements: SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT route_id, start_time, end_time FROM public_transportation_data;
SELECT user_id, date FROM public_transportation_data WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM public_transportation_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data ORDER BY date ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, route_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%m/%d/%Y') AS formatted_date, start_time, end_time FROM public_transportation_data WHERE route_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM public_transportation_data WHERE end_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT user_id, MIN(start_time) AS earliest_start_time, MAX(end_time) AS latest_end_time FROM public_transportation_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id, date DESC, start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM public_transportation_users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_name, route_name FROM public_transportation_users JOIN public_transportation_routes ON public_transportation_users.route_id = public_transportation_routes.route_id;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_users;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM public_transportation_users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, age, gender, route_name FROM public_transportation_users JOIN public_transportation_routes ON public_transportation_users.route_id = public_transportation_routes.route_id;

SELECT user_name, age, gender, route_name FROM public_transportation_users INNER JOIN public_transportation_routes ON public_transportation_users.route_id = public_transportation_routes.route_id ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE phone_number = '+123456789';
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, trip_date, trip_duration_minutes FROM Trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(trip_id) AS num_trips FROM Trips GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_trips > 2 ORDER BY num_trips DESC;

SELECT user_id, route_name, trip_date FROM Users JOIN Trips ON Users.user_id = Trips.user_id JOIN Routes ON Trips.route_id = Routes.route_id WHERE trip_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trip_date ASC;

SELECT start_location, end_location, AVG(trip_duration_minutes) AS avg_duration FROM Routes JOIN Trips ON Routes.route_id = Trips.route_id GROUP BY start_location, end_location HAVING AVG(trip_duration_minutes) > 30 ORDER BY avg_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT user_id, date FROM transportation_usage WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(fare) AS total_fare FROM ticket_information GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_fare DESC;

SELECT t.ticket_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, r.route_name, t.fare FROM ticket_information t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id JOIN public_transportation_routes r ON t.route_id = r.route_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT stop_name, location FROM stops ORDER BY stop_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, capacity FROM vehicles WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM trips WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM routes WHERE route_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY route_name;
SELECT name, age FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY name;
SELECT route_name, vehicle_type, day_of_week FROM routes r JOIN schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id WHERE s.day_of_week = 'Friday' ORDER BY route_name, day_of_week;
SELECT stop_name, location FROM stops s LEFT JOIN trips t ON s.stop_id = t.stop_id WHERE t.passenger_id IS NULL ORDER BY stop_name ASC;
